long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple color picker

Helps you to get any pixel colored. Will be useful for developers and designers.


*Important!* After installing the extension, you need to restart your browser. This is due to the peculiarities of Google Chrome. I will try to fix it in the next version. Sorry.


Features include

Color picker tool
Multiple color formatting: RGB, HEX, HSV
Copy on click
